DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to demonstrate the multiple-dose efficacy and safety of HKT-500 for the treatment of ankle sprain.
DOC.brief_title: HKT-500 in Adult Patients With Ankle Sprain
DOC.detailed_description: Randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, multicenter study in men and women 18 years of age or older who have a painful, acute, benign, ankle sprain of the lateral ligament(s) within the previous 48 hours.
DOC.criteria: Grade I or Grade II Ankle Sprain. The subject is a women of childbearing potential who has a positive urine pregnancy test, who is lactating, who is not surgically sterile (by tubal ligation or hysterectomy), or at least 2 years postmenopausal, and has not practice an acceptable form of birth control (defined as the use of an intrauterine device with spermicide, a barrier method with spermicide, condoms with spermicide, subdermal implant, oral contraceptives, or abstinence) for at least 2 months prior to Visit 1.
